Global Scope

Properties

paper
paper

A reference to the currently active PaperScope object.

    Type:
  • PaperScope

Global PaperScope Properties (for PaperScript)

project

The currently active project.

    Type:
  • Project
projects

The list of all open projects within the current Paper.js context.

    Type:
  • Array of Project objects

Methods

initialize()
initialize()
exportProject(project)
exportProject(project)

Takes the selected Paper.js project and parses all of its layers and groups to be placed into SVG groups, converting the project into one SVG group.

    Parameters:
  • project: Paper.js Project — A Paper.js project
    Returns:
  • SVG DOM — this.svgObj The imported project converted to an SVG project
